questions.text: What is your favorite G-Star product category?
What is your main reason for visiting G-Star today?
How often do you shop at G-Star?

inspiration.subject_line: Reignite Your Style Journey with G-Star
inspiration.preheader: Remember when you first discovered G-Star? Let's rediscover that passion together.
inspiration.hero_image_description: A dynamic image of a G-Star denim collection, showcasing innovative designs and sustainable materials, evoking a sense of creativity and individuality.
inspiration.first_paragraph: We noticed you haven't been exploring our latest collections recently. At G-Star, we're committed to helping you express your unique style. Let's reignite that passion and discover what's new.

first.template: You've achieved {{customer.highest_value_achieved}} in style milestones with us.
first.fallback: You've achieved incredible style milestones with us.

second.template: Unlock potential savings of {{customer.potential_savings}} on your next purchase.
second.fallback: Unlock exclusive savings on your next purchase.

nostalgia.preheader: From your first purchase to now, let's celebrate your style evolution.
nostalgia.hero_image_description: A nostalgic image of a classic G-Star denim jacket, symbolizing timeless style and enduring quality.
nostalgia.first_paragraph: We've cherished every step of your style journey with us. From your first purchase to your latest favorite, G-Star has been there to support your unique expression.

first.template: Your relationship with G-Star is valued at {{customer.relationship_value}}.
first.fallback: Your relationship with G-Star is invaluable.

second.template: You've invested {{customer.lifetime_value}} in timeless style with us.
second.fallback: You've invested in timeless style with us.

social_proof.preheader: Your style is missed in our vibrant community. Let's reconnect.
social_proof.hero_image_description: A vibrant image of a G-Star fashion show, showcasing a diverse and engaged community of style enthusiasts.
social_proof.first_paragraph: Your unique style is a vital part of our community. We've missed seeing you explore our latest collections and join in our fashion-forward conversations.

first.template: You're ranked {{customer.community_rank}} in our style community.
first.fallback: You're a valued member of our style community.

second.template: Your engagement score is {{customer.engagement_score}}, showing your impact in our community.
second.fallback: Your impact in our community is significant.
